metadata.intended_purpose: Automated customer support responses using retrieval-augmented generation

failed_traces.context: Apple reported Q4 2024 revenue of $89.5 billion, up 6% year-over-year.
failed_traces.reason: Numerical hallucination - 5x overestimate of actual revenue

failed_traces.context: Standard warranty: 12 months from purchase date. Extended warranty available for additional 24 months.
failed_traces.answer: The warranty is valid for 6 months.
failed_traces.reason: Incorrect duration - stated 6 months instead of 12 months

failed_traces.context: Returns accepted within 30 days with receipt. Items must be unused and in original packaging.
failed_traces.answer: You can return items within 90 days without a receipt.
failed_traces.reason: Multiple errors - wrong timeframe (90 vs 30 days) and missing receipt requirement

evaluation_methodology: CERT uses dual-component measurement combining semantic similarity (cosine similarity of embeddings) and grounding analysis (NLI entailment + term overlap). Responses pass when confidence exceeds 0.7 threshold, indicating strong alignment between generated answer and source context.
compliance_statement: This system meets EU AI Act Article 15 requirements for accuracy monitoring. Evaluation conducted on 950 production traces over 31-day period. Pass rate of 94.1% exceeds 90% compliance threshold. Mean confidence of 0.847 indicates strong grounding in source material. Failed traces analyzed for systematic issues - no bias patterns detected.
